alert.note: Alert for Lancaster (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 7:29PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL LANCASTER COUNTY THROUGH 800 PM EDT... At 729 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Millersville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Willow Street, Paradise, Strasburg, Quarryville, Gap, Smithville, Lampeter, Atglen, Intercourse, Conestoga, Christiana, Georgetown, Gordonville, Bird-In-Hand, Smoketown, Refton, Buck, White Horse, Rawlinsville and Dutch Wonderland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
